text.__SUMMARY__:
Inga pauciflora, the Guabita De Río, is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
The specific epithet pauciflora is Latin for 'few-flowered'.
It is found only in Panama.
It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: Mitré, M. 1998.  Inga pauciflora.   2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.  Downloaded on 10 July 2007.
